column4: I setup gnump3d perfectly, but when I reset my computer it says the port is in use, so I change the port. If I reset again it'll say its in  use again, so I have to switch it every time I reset, help :)

I setup gnump3d perfectly, but when I reset my computer it says the port is in use, so I change the port. If I reset again it'll say its in  use again, so I have to switch it every time I reset, help :)
check what is using the port with 'sudo fuser -v portnumber/tcp' where portnumber is the number of the port.
